attributes.action: We Want M Ilias Ali and his Driver Ansar Ali to be Released Immediately
attributes.additional_details: M Ilias Ali the former MP of Bangladesh Parliament, Central Organizing Secretary of Bangladesh Nationalist Party and his driver Ansar Ali who were abducted on 17th April, 2012 and dissapeared. We are extremely concerned about their current welfare and safety. We the citizens of Great Britain want the immediate release of M. Ilias Ali and his driver and the British Government to put pressure on Bangladesh Government for his safe return. We are looking forward to everyone to come forward with your strong diplomatic initiatives to rescue M Ilias Ali along with Ansar Ali. We would be grateful if you would please, as a matter of urgency to this alarming matter and raise your strong voice.
